results.content: He is not explaining what he is doing before he is doing it.  I have no idea why i need to use docker and why I installed laravel.  He just jumped right into the programming.
results.content_html: He is not explaining what he is doing before he is doing it. I have no idea why i need to use docker and why I installed laravel. He just jumped right into the programming.

results.content: I love the way the course was done, so informative and worthy the penny, He used his own way of codding not that everyone is using for that I have learnt alot and I will recommend to everyone looking for a laravel advanced course to clear missing pieces

results.content: Very impressed with the attention to detail given by the instructor.  I have been able to follow each step and understand the purpose of each.  That is not true for a lot of courses.  I tip my cap for the excellent presentation!
results.content_html: Very impressed with the attention to detail given by the instructor. I have been able to follow each step and understand the purpose of each. That is not true for a lot of courses. I tip my cap for the excellent presentation!

results.content: It is a very very nice course. I would recommend it to anyone interested in learning Laravel
results.content_html: It is a very very nice course. I would recommend it to anyone interested in learning Laravel

results.content: It is very good a lot of things to learn from.
results.content_html: It is very good a lot of things to learn from.

results.content: If you already sort of know what you are doing, then it's possible to follow what the lecturer is doing. Otherwise, if you're new to some of the topics, you can only repeat what the lecturer is doing, without understanding what's going on.
